parameter.name: fromName
parameter.description: The name which will in 'from' email header.

parameter.name: fromEmail
parameter.description: Sender email address of the campaign.

parameter.name: replyToName
parameter.description: The name which will shown in 'reply-to' email header.

parameter.name: targetListIds
parameter.description: ID numbers of recipient lists. This parameter should be sent in array format.

parameter.name: targetSegmentIds
parameter.description: ID numbers of recipient segments. This parameter should be sent in array format.

parameter.name: customerIds
parameter.description: ID numbers of customer accounts you want to give access for reporting. This parameter should be sent in array format.

parameter.name: campaignId
parameter.description: ID of the email campaign to update.
